item.content:encoded:
Well TLC Blockcare has been busy over the last few weeks. Our clients are very happy and have already enjoyed many nights using their new outdoor kitchen. If you need help with your outdoor area before summer please give TLC Blockcare a call. All our work is carried out by qualified tradies who love building this sort of thing. We look forward to your phone call.

The post New Outdoor Kitchen appeared first on TLC Blockcare.

item.title: Getting ready for the new season
item.dc:creator: fatweb
item.description:
The Tractors and Ride on Lawn Mowers are all ready for the new season. We have been busy this week topping unruly paddocks as the spring growth has now started.  The ride on lawn mowers have been busy getting lawns in great shape before summer. Please contact TLC Blockcare 03 928 3984 for all your topping and mowing needs.  Remember ...

Read More

The post Getting ready for the new season appeared first on TLC Blockcare.
item.content:encoded:
The Tractors and Ride on Lawn Mowers are all ready for the new season. We have been busy this week topping unruly paddocks as the spring growth has now started.  The ride on lawn mowers have been busy getting lawns in great shape before summer. Please contact TLC Blockcare 03 928 3984 for all your topping and mowing needs.  Remember the HINT of the month is to check your paddocks before closing up for hay or silage , make sure you or your kids have not left anything in the paddock that could damage the topper.

The post Getting ready for the new season appeared first on TLC Blockcare.

item.title: BBQs Direct
item.dc:creator: fatweb
item.description:
We love our relaxed outdoor kiwi lifestyle and live the alfresco way of life, entertaining and eating outdoors – enjoying fun times with our family and friends. At BBQs Direct we specialise in Gas Built-In BBQs & Outdoor Kitchens for the discerning entertainer. If you’re trying to look up some serious lifestyle BBQ and Grill options then we have the solutions for ...

Read More

The post BBQs Direct appeared first on TLC Blockcare.
item.content:encoded:
We love our relaxed outdoor kiwi lifestyle and live the alfresco way of life, entertaining and eating outdoors – enjoying fun times with our family and friends.

At BBQs Direct we specialise in Gas Built-In BBQs & Outdoor Kitchens for the discerning entertainer. If you’re trying to look up some serious lifestyle BBQ and Grill options then we have the solutions for you.
 
Our high quality outdoor kitchen modules, built in additions and combo units and outdoor fridges provide the ultimate flexibility to create a kitchen unique to your own instant outdoor entertainment area. 
View our website for all the latest specials www.bbqsdirect.co.nz

The post BBQs Direct appeared first on TLC Blockcare.
